attributes.action: Make Jeremy Hunt read this plea from a Medical Registrar
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, want Jeremy Hunt to read this statement from a Medical Registrar.

http://www.facebook.com/medicalreg/posts/10151320210428842

In just one hour on Facebook, 4000 people have "liked" this status, most of them doctors and nurses. Please take note.

rejection.details: This is currently a petition for a minister to read a Facebook page.
